item.title: Jenny add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "The way to happiness: Keep your heart free from hate, your mind from worry. Live simply, expect little, give much. Scatter sunshine, forget self, think of others. Try this for a week and you will be surprised." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Kay Wills Wyma
item.description: "Instead of communicating "I love you, so let me make life easy for you," I decided that my message needed to be something more along these lines: "I love you. I believe in you. I know what you're capable of. So I'm going to make you work." -- Kay Wills Wyma
